movie.title: Stalingrad
movie.description_intro: A depiction of the brutal battle of Stalingrad, the Third Reich's 'high water mark', as seen through the eyes of German officer Hans von Witzland and his battalion.
movie.description_full: A depiction of the brutal battle of Stalingrad, the Third Reich's 'high water mark', as seen through the eyes of German officer Hans von Witzland and his battalion.

movies.title: Quanta
movies.summary: A physicist's life-long work comes to fruition when he is reluctantly partnered with a gifted young assistant. Ego divides them when they receive an unknown signal from space.
movies.description_full: A physicist's life-long work comes to fruition when he is reluctantly partnered with a gifted young assistant. Ego divides them when they receive an unknown signal from space.
movies.synopsis: A physicist's life-long work comes to fruition when he is reluctantly partnered with a gifted young assistant. Ego divides them when they receive an unknown signal from space.

movies.title: Certified Copy
movies.summary: James Miller has just written a book on the value of a copy versus the original work of art. At a book reading, a woman gives him her address, and the next day they meet and take a country-side drive to a local Italian village. Here, they discuss various works of art found in the town, and also the nature of their relationship - which gets both more revealed and concealed as the day progresses.

movies.title: South Terminal
movies.summary: In a country plunging into armed conflict, a doctor tries to do his duty against all odds, until the day his destiny is turned upside down.
movies.description_full: In a country plunging into armed conflict, a doctor tries to do his duty against all odds, until the day his destiny is turned upside down.
movies.synopsis: In a country plunging into armed conflict, a doctor tries to do his duty against all odds, until the day his destiny is turned upside down.

movies.title: Tiger
movies.summary: A boxer is banned by the commission for refusing to back down from his beliefs. Through racial profiling and stereotypical threats, he does what any strong American would do, fight back. As a consequence, his legacy will be forever tied to his two biggest battles: one in the courtroom, the other in the ring.
